solution_line_template: Since 1 dozen is equal to {items_per_dozen}, then the vendor sold {lemons_dozens} x {items_per_dozen} = <<{lemons_dozens}*{items_per_dozen}={lemons_count}>>{lemons_count} lemons.
So, the fruit vendor sold a total of {lemons_count} + {avocados_count} = <<{lemons_count}+{avocados_count}={total_fruits}>>{total_fruits} fruits.
